name: Movr
description:
Movr is an easy introduction to Virtual Reality targeted for users of any age. Movr allows players to race against the clock, speeding up by scoping out beacons along a pre-programmed path in an open, futuristic world. Players will also utilize the HTC Vive or Oculus Rift to have access to a full 360 degrees view of their surroundings, an essential part of the gameplay.

If you are playing on Oculus Rift, a gamepad is required.

Press space to restart the level.
